Member Function Documentation

◆ AddData()

void tsa::SIM_Channel::AddData ( )
virtual

This function must be called when there are not enough data to fill the output view. It reads a chunk of data from the next FrSimData structure.

Reimplemented from tsa::ChannelDescriptor.
